meanings.definition: The process of making a garden or piece of land more attractive by altering the existing design, adding ornamental features, and planting trees and shrubs.
meanings.sent1: Landscaping can transform a plain yard into a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy working on landscaping projects in my free time.
meanings.sent3: The landscaping in the park made the ducks feel like they were in a fancy resort.
meanings.sent4: Her landscaping skills turned the backyard into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The landscaping at the botanical garden was so breathtaking that visitors couldn't stop taking pictures.

meanings.definition: The activity of improving the appearance of a piece of land by planting trees, flowers, or grass, and by making it look more attractive.
meanings.sent1: We hired a professional to do the landscaping for our front yard.
meanings.sent2: The landscaping around the office building is well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: The landscaping competition brought out the creativity in all the participants.
meanings.sent4: The real estate value increased due to the beautiful landscaping in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: His passion for landscaping was evident in every corner of his property.
